title: App Club Talks: Exploration of Azure Machine Learning Studio
description: We learn about Azure Machine Learning Studio, and what they can be used for.
body:
Pei Seng, an AI Engineer at ViTrox and Microsoft Student Partner Malaysia will explore with us what we could do with Azure Machine Learning Studio. Azure Machine Learning Studio is a collaborative visual development environment that helps you to build, test, and deploy predictive analytics solutions on the cloud. You can easily connect to data, choose an algorithm from a ready-to-use library of algorithms, and build an end-to-end predictive workflow. 

[Youtube Livestream](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4-1CG1YTumQ)
